name: Mrs. Time and the Doom of Mankind
name_original: Mrs. Time and the Doom of Mankind
description:
A time-loop escape-room, 14 minutes to save the world. Can you learn to do it in one go? 

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

Mrs. Time and the Doom of Mankind is a puzzle game built around time-loops. The machinery of The Time Keep is malfunctioning, and Mrs. Time, the Keeper of Time and Space, must repair what is broken in just 14 minutes, otherwise mankind will meet their doom. 14 minutes will not do, so she put herself inside of a time loop. When the 14 minutes runs out, she loops back to the start. The player will not be able to finish the game in just one loop, they must first collect knowledge of how to solve each puzzle, and in which order, throughout several time-loops. The clock is ticking, do you have time?

- - - - - - - - - - - - - -
